dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Re-edition of 1749 L'Amérique Septentrionale et Méridionale. Engraved by: Delahaye l'ainé. Cartouche designed and engraved by: Arrivet. Table to right of map provides information on the different countries of the two continents.
dct_publisher_sm: Paris : Chés l'autheur Quai de l'horloge du Palais, près le Pont Neuf, 1771.
